backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files and components with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend component and content file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and base layout styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering navigation, hero section, multiple educational sections, references, and footer.
frontend/src/components/CalloutCard.tsx: Reusable styled card component with variant-based icons and border colors for highlighting information.
frontend/src/components/DisclaimerBanner: Alert banner component showing a highlighted medical disclaimer with list of cautions.
frontend/src/components/SectionShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing consistent spacing, headings, and scroll offset for each content section.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer displaying site description, author credits, quick links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive sticky navigation bar with smooth scroll, mobile sheet menu, and scroll-state styling.
frontend/src/content/blueLightCircadianC: Defines structured content about blue light, circadian rhythms, biological mechanisms, and research findings for use in the UI.
frontend/src/content/references.ts: Exports a Reference interface and a list of citation objects for the references section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider logic, handling login, identity loading, and status management using Dfinity’s AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles, custom CSS variables, color themes, typography rules, and dark mode variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by creating the root, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and loading global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s metadata, features, requirements, and current state for build and planning purposes.
